    def similarity(self, vec1, vec2):
        """Calculate cosine similarity between two vectors"""
        # Find common terms
        common_terms = set(vec1.keys()) & set(vec2.keys())
        
        # Calculate dot product
        dot_product = sum(vec1[term] * vec2[term] for term in common_terms)
